overview: Experience a Marine base like no other in Paul Barresi's "Freshman Recruits" - and march into the year's hottest all-male military meatfest...where smokin' sex, down 'n dirty dialogue and a passion-pumped, pud-pounding plot scorch the screen in spewing splendor!
tagline: A Hot, Hung and Hard Group of New U.S. Marine Recruits Ready and Willing to Satisfy Their Incredible Demands!
title: Freshmen Recruits
